recommendations: Devyanshu . ‚ÄúVinit Sir is a wonderful teacher and has exceptional expertise in field of market/trading. His decades of experience has given a better insight of the trading world. His passion to teach is evident through his responses to students and best thing is his ability to relate the questions to real life examples gained through his experiences. He has simplified the learning process of analyzing sectors and companies on various parameters even for newbies who don't have basic knowledge of finance or trading. Overall, Sir is one of the coolest mentor/ teacher and it's fun to learn with him.‚Äù

LinkedIn User ‚ÄúI got in touch with Vinit on linkedin due to the common interest on equity research. I have found him very passionate about his work...He is well read and is always upto date with global affairs. I admire his passion for teaching and sharing the wealth of knowledge he has gained over 3 decades.‚Äù
